title: Gorune born 7:02pm, now newest Armenian typgrapher!
content:
Congratulations to Hrant and his wife on the birth of their baby last night! He is now a Baby Bouma!  
Here is wishing them all health and happiness.

ChrisL
author: dezcom

comments.content:
Congratulations!  
Best of happiness and health to Mrs. Papazian and baby Gorune.

Good luck Papa Papazian getting any sleep for the next several months.

**I expect this will mean substantially less posts by <cite>Papa</cite>-zian on this board…? Just kidding.**

Congratulations!  
  
ƒ
Congratulations!

_…substantially less posts by Papa-zian…_

If Gorune ain’t a sleeper, papa could be posting all night while rocking the baby. Let’s hope that doesn’t happen!

Congrats to you all, hhp.
All the best. Enjoy.
Congratulations, Hrant! Welcome to the club.
congrats, hrant! what happy news!

Thanks guys!

BTW, Goryune\* means lion cub. And it just happens to have been  
the name of Mesrob Mashdots’s top disciple, who went on to write  
his biography and detail the creation of the Armenian alphabet.  
So whether he ends up a jock or a bookworm we’re covered. :-)

\* The usual transliteration is “Goryoun”, and “Gorune”  
is more common in some countries (like France) but we  
decided on the Google-unique “Goryune” last minute.

hhp
Congratulations, Hrant. Pictures soon?

Congratulations to the happy family.  
Tim
![](http://web.archive.org/files/Goryune1.jpg)

Precious! Looks older than one day and came through the birth totally unscathed. Very beautiful baby Hrant! Your wife must be gorgeous :-)

ChrisL

Congratulations Hrant! I’m sure little Hrad is very excited about his new little brother! Best to the misses!

Stuart :D
hrant, very big congrats!

Chris, very funny. :-/  
When somebody says Hrad looks like me, my standard  
reply is that’s just an -unfortunate- coincidence. :-)

Stuart, Hrad is indeed delighted… although you can see the  
twinge of ambivalence… The trick I guess is to get the older  
kid to help with the newborn, to avoid too much jealousy.  
Hmmm, you think Hrad can start driving Goryune to  
preschool in three years? ;-\>

Anyway, guys, back to type, eh?  
Eventually when my boys jump  
in they’ll spin their own stories  
and show their own images! ;-)

hhp

congratulations!

———-  
nc

The trick is, make sure you spend enough one on one time with the older kid before jealousy rears its ugly head - This will temper the level it may reach let’s say - You will see first hand how passive aggresive behavior develops in the coming 3-6 months …

Then they’ll be perfect little play buddies - Till then just as before - sleep when the baby does …

:D
Congradulations!
Congratulations Hrant!

So, the little cub stuck to the schedule it seems.;^)

All the best with the new arrival, Hrant. Enjoy. :^)

Wow! The very best wishes to you all!

Kris.

That’s wonderful, Hrant. Congratulations!

(Hmm, based on head shape, either C-section or very short labor.)

T

lateral interfernce, aka sibling rivalry, is unavoidable; with proper space craft and contrast manipulation it contributes to effective cross-sibling binding—unless Hrad asserts his cap height…just keep a parafovea on ’em.

all the best to you all Hrant!

Congratulations, Hrant! Best wishes to you and your newly expanded family.

Very best compliments Hrant. My wife is kissing Goryune’s picture on-screen (I think she will start all over again on me now).

j a m e s

_Hmm, based on head shape, either C-section or very short labor._

No, it just means he’s Armenian :)

Congratulations, Hrant. May God heap blessings on your family.

And yet more thanks guys.

Thomas: wow you’re good!

Peter: now that was funny. :-\>

hhp
Congratulation Hrant!!!
Congrats, Hrant!
Congratulations, Hrant!
Congratulations! Woot!
you da man
you da man
Very best wishes to you and your family, Hrant. Congratulations!
Belated congrats Hrant! The best to you and yours.

Congratulations Hrant

Congratulations, Hrant…though I was expecting your baby to come out with a mustache! :)

Hey, congratulations!

Best wishes to you Hrant and your wife.
Conghrantulations!

Congratulations, Hrant. He’s beautiful! You know, with more than one, they actually keep each other busy — and some of the time it’s not by fighting!
